Package lumis.service.activitystream

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IActivityStreamManagerSPI
    Service provider interface for the activity stream framework manager.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activity
    Object that represents an activity in the activity stream framework.
    ActivityAction
    The action performed during an Activity.
    ActivityActor
    The actor of an Activity.
    ActivityDateFilter
    Converts the filter start date into milliseconds.
    ActivityObject
    Object on which an action is applied during an Activity.
    ActivityObjectType
    Type of an object referenced in a Activity.
    ActivityPostLoadProcessor
    Processes the activitystream activity source, converting the field createdDateTimeMillis from Long into Date.
    ActivityStreamDeleteProcessActionHandler
    ProcessActionHandler responsible for deletion of a Activity.
    ActivityStreamJSONUtils
    Utility object to convert activity stream objects to and from JSON and String.
    ActivityStreamManager
    Manager for the activity stream framework.
    ActivityStreamManagerFactoryInternal
    Activity stream managers for internal use.
    ActivityStreamResource
    REST API for activity stream.
    ActivityStreamResource.ActivityListResult
    JAXB entity used to return a list of activities.
    ActivityStreamService
    Activity stream service implementation.
